title: Rebels south of Syrian capital surrender: State media
text:
Rebels south of Syrian capital surrender: State media 1:33pm BST - 01:47 
A Reuters source says some rebels from the Damascus suburbs will be evacuated to eastern Syria as President Bashar al-Assad accelerates efforts on the remaining holdouts.   
A Reuters source says some rebels from the Damascus suburbs will be evacuated to eastern Syria as President Bashar al-Assad accelerates efforts on the remaining holdouts.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/04/20/rebels-south-of-syrian-capital-surrender?videoId=419562301&videoChannel=13422
